page.title: 03Liverpool,Newsham_Housing
page.content: Stock in area is mixed, Victorian (North) to inter_war (South) with timber framed infills latterly. Since W.W. 2 replacement of substandard housing has continued, in patches rather than belts. Later building techniques are now queried on grounds of habitability and durability. High_rise blocks now accepted to be disliked by occupants. Concern is expressed over the ageing of a large propotion of the housing stock. City council has embarked on largest programme of house construction for rent in nation.
